headline: How Corpay’s (CPAY) Appointment of Shell Executive David Bunch Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Corpay, Inc. has appointed London-based executive David Bunch, Group Executive Vice President for Mobility & Convenience at Shell PLC, to its Board of Directors, effective January 22, 2026. Bunch’s deep experience running large, globally scaled mobility and digital platform businesses brings fresh international operational insight to Corpay’s boardroom. Next, we’ll examine how Bunch’s global operating background may influence Corpay’s investment narrative and perceived long-term corporate...

headline: Corpay (CPAY) Valuation Check After Rebrand And Mixed Shareholder Returns
summary: Corpay (CPAY) has been drawing attention after its recent rebrand from FLEETCOR Technologies, as investors reassess a payments business spanning vehicle expenses, corporate payments, and lodging solutions across several major markets. See our latest analysis for Corpay. The recent rebrand comes as Corpay’s share price sits at US$320.52, with a 90 day share price return of 12.76% and a 3 year total shareholder return of 56.85%. This suggests that longer term holders have experienced stronger...
